name: Duel'em Dave
description:
You are an outlaw, winning duels to stay alive- quickly becoming the best gunman in the old west. However, being the best comes with its challenges. You must face off in 3 fast-paced and strategic levels against enemies who want to win your title, and get your glory, as you figure out the type of outlaw you will become.

Duel'em Dave is a 2D Western shooter game with 3 different levels and some point-and-click gameplay elements.

Beta test version - June 26th, 2021

Full game coming free - Saturday, July 3rd, 2021
